title: Junior AI/ML Engineer
description: Work on real-world AI/ML applications using Azure Cloud services, develop APIs, and integrate with various systems and tools. Ideal for someone starting a career in AI & ML.

title: Software Developer
description: Work on remote desktop software and global IT products. Use modern tools for efficient work including live chat, ticketing systems, and Atlassian. Offers flexible hours and mentorship.

title: Business Analyst
description: Analyze business requirements and act as a bridge between product, development, and stakeholders. Opportunity to work in the gaming or tech industry.

title: Frontend Product Manager
description: Drive product strategy and frontend development. Collaborate closely with design and engineering teams to create high-quality user experiences.

title: Accountant
description: Perform accounting tasks in a stable and growing environment. Permanent position with flexible working hours and opportunities for career advancement.
